title: Old phone Battery died.during initial sync with pixel 4a 5g. Now it Won't pick up where it left off.
content: I had a problem where the battery was dying on my old Motorola Android phone during the initial sync with pixel.  So I unplugged it and charged the Motorola. But when I plugged it back together with the pixel to continue the sync it won't restart doing so. Any suggestions?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
